task.name: h_resume
task.shortdescription: Restore a save pipeline context from disk
task.description: h_resume restores a name pipeline context from disk allowing a suspended pipeline reduction session to be resumed.

param.name: contextname
param.description: Name of saved context to be restored

task.example:
h_resume restores a name pipeline context from disk allowing a suspended pipeline reduction session to be resumed.
Keyword parameters:
contextname -- Name of the saved pipeline context. Setting contextname to 'last' restores the most recently saved pipeline context state whose name begins with 'context*'. default: 'last' example: context='context.s3.2012-02-13T10:49:11' context='last'
Description
h_resume restores a name pipeline context from disk allowing a suspended pipeline reduction session to be resumed.
Issues
Examples
1. Resume the last saved session
h_resume()
2. Resume the named saved session
h_resume(contexname='context.s3.2012-02-13T10:49:11')
